channel.title: Making a server for windows vista?
channel.description:
Hello i was a retard yesterday and broke my comp.... so instead of re-installing Windows XP... i installed Windows Vista... and as most of the people who have it then you will know that it is hard to get used to.....
so there i was with a server and everything.... until it got wiped clean off....
so can some kind person make a tut of what the title says....
(some things which are in the other Tut are not in the vista version....)
thanks.

item.title: Making a server for windows vista?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Lmao, I’m using vista… And I used just a plain tutorial on making servers… And now my server rules… Lol

Read full topic
